long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stupid Zombies is a thrilling puzzle game with a zombie-shooting twist, available as a Chrome extension. Developed by MarketJS, this game will put your aiming skills to the test as you battle against hordes of zombies. Armed with a gun, your goal is to eliminate the zombies by shooting bullets that bounce off surfaces. It's all about finding the perfect angles to achieve the highest number of zombie kills with the fewest bullets possible. Prepare to showcase the power of your aim and take down those stupid zombies! You can play Stupid Zombies for free on the website https://1v1lol.org/.

*Note: We have added "Unblocked Games" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://unblockedgames6x.org/ and https://1v1lol.org
